I have never been this consistently invested in a game before in my life. I love the ability to cross platform play with people from all over, and despite the per usual, the unfortunate gaming culture most of us are told to just endure, have fun, and play their game, DBD has an incredible interactive community whoâ€™ve theyâ€™ve inspired. The way their no tolerance on hatred or homophobia when the pride charms were released (around the time I started playing) made me feel like this game is always ready to not only bring something fresh, new, and surprising to its devoted fans, but are just as committed to protecting equal, fair, non-harassment, good ole fun for all their players too. I have a few Fog Whisperer friends who do phenomenal jobs of being those positive and unbiased honest pillars in both the DBD community, as well as their own. I could only dream of something like that, someday. I love this game so much and the people, sure to be lifelong friends, and all other positives it has brought into my life.
